Paregraphs.Text: JIT truly believes in giving its stake holders a wide range of opportunities & good jobs to choose from. The training & placement cell of the college through extensive training programmes. makes the students of JIT, a cheery-picked group for the recruiters. 75, otthe eligible students got placements in Campus selection process atJIT, this year. Premiere companies like Infosys, Persistent Systems, Infocepts, ZENSAR Technologies, Amazon, Smart Data, Syntego, Essence IT Solutions, Mphasis, Excellon Software etc. conducted Campus interviews at JIT in a pool campus.

Lists.Header: The T & P cell grooms the students extensively in varied fields

Lists.Value: CV and the writing of a cover letter

Paregraphs.Text: The T & P Cell has a well-equipped conference room and separate, well-ventillated furnished rooms for interviews and counseling.

Paregraphs.H2: Members from the T & P Department

Details.Paregraph: JIT is proud that its graduates are highly rated by employers from industry and commerce in the private and public sectors.The Placement and Training Centre is provided with a well-equipped conference training room and separate, well-furnished rooms for interviews and counselling. Mr. Kunal Padole is Dean-Training & Placement,/ Corporate Relations at Jhulelal Institute of Technology. He has over 9 years of experience in Campus Recruitments, Staffing Solutions, Client Servicing and Business Development. He is Secretary of Vidarbha Engineering College Placement Association and is also 'Vice President' (Management Opportunity) in 'JCI-Junior Chamber International' Nagpur Chapter. Mr. Kunal Padole is double post graduate with MBA (Master of Business Administration )degree in Marketing & Human Resources, from RTM Nagpur University. He has an efficient team to assist him to impart extensive training to students for getting through written tests, GD and PI.
